attributes.title: AuditTrails Dashboard

query.query: event.dataset: yandexcloud.audittrail and event.action:  yandex.cloud.audit.compute.CreateInstance and details.network_interfaces.index: 1

event.dataset: yandexcloud.audittrail and error.message: Permission denied

event.dataset: yandexcloud.audittrail and (event.action: yandex.cloud.audit.network.CreateSecurityGroup or yandex.cloud.audit.network.UpdateSecurityGroup) and details.rules.direction: INGRESS and details.rules.cidr_blocks.v4_cidr_blocks: *0.0.0.0*
event.dataset: yandexcloud.audittrail and event.action: yandex.cloud.audit.compute.CreateImage and cloud.image.source_uri: *
